page.title: 11THE PONTELAND LOCAL PLAN
page.content: The{Ponteland Local Plan}is suggestions for land use around Ponteland which particulaly includes policies to do with the{Green Belt}and housing.The Green Belt is an area of land which you are not allowed to build on.It mostly covers countryside and it does not include the built up areas.At present,the Green Belt boundary in{Ponteland}runs down{ Callerton Lane.It is proposed to change the{boundary}so that it will include the schools,sports centre and the Fire Station. Housing:between 1985-1996,180 new houses are proposed in Ponteland and Darras Hall.80 houses up to 1991 and 100 houses between 1991 and 1996.In the area around Eland Hall,houses have already been built but no more will be built between the period 1991-1996.
